revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{af|en|xanth-|odonto-|-ous}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj}} # {{lb|en|rare}} Having [[yellow]] [[tooth|teeth]]. #* '''1951''', ''The Journal of the Michigan State Dental Association'' #*: Just tell her that she is naturally '''xanthodontous'''. It will not make her teeth any whiter, but it will exalt her ego.
